description:
Up to-date I have hired and fired over 500 outsourced employees. Through this experience I have really learned what to expect, and what a person doesn't want when looking for employees. I have spent thousands doing this and failing but all for a good reason. I wanted to master it, and I did just that. I have hired 30-+ employees without a bad one in the bunch, and I'm here to show you some of my secrets.

What would you do if I told you with the right formula you can replace yourself over and over until you had a snowball of money coming your way. Our goal in this is to give you all of the tools to create a snowball effect of money and then just feed that snowball till it becomes avalanche.

In this course you will learn everything you need to become a successful entrepreneur outsourcing your teams and making money with no work.
title: Outsourcing From Scratch To Riches
